summary: Manager and Operator profile pages were updated to include a prominent, page-level “Log out” button wired to the centralized `useAppLogout().logout` handler and styled to remain visible on mobile/desktop. However, the diff does not provide evidence that the logout action clears credential/admin-token state, clears the React Query cache, and navigates to `/login` (those behaviors are inside `useAppLogout`, which is not shown/changed here).

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking the profile page "Log out" button clears the credential session (and any admin token state), clears the React Query cache, and navigates to /login.
missing_requirements.reason: The profile pages call `logout` from `useAppLogout`, but the diff provides no evidence of what `logout` actually does (no changes or excerpts from `frontend/src/hooks/useAppLogout.ts`). Therefore the required side effects (clearing credential/admin token state, clearing React Query cache, redirecting to `/login`) cannot be verified from the provided diff summary alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/implemented a "Back" button with `useGoBackOrDashboard` navigation on both Manager and Operator profile pages.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-78 only requests a clearly visible "Log out" button on the profile pages; it does not request adding a back-navigation control.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/implemented additional profile UI content (role label with icon and optional Login ID display).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-78 is specifically about ensuring a visible, working logout button; it does not request adding/changing profile fields or displays (and non-goals explicitly mention not adding new profile fields).
